game.mode

Class GameMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.mode.GameMode
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CTFGameMode, RaceGameMode

    public abstract class GameMode
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements all the things which are dependent on the game mode. A game mode can influence the build process, the win and the lose conditions.
